thread.title: Bill Clinton appears in virtual-reality movie on Africa - The New Zealand Herald
thread.title_full: Bill Clinton appears in virtual-reality movie on Africa - The New Zealand Herald - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: The New Zealand Herald
title: Bill Clinton appears in virtual-reality movie on Africa - The New Zealand Herald
text:
" As world leaders descend on the United Nations this weekend, former President Bill Clinton will be taking them to East Africa through virtual reality. Viewers with special goggles will be able to follow Clinton's travels in eight minutes.
 The New Zealand Herald.
